content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. So, what price were you thinking for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, but I'm a student and I'm looking for the best deal possible. What's the lowest price you can offer?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide the best service to my tenants. However, I also need to maintain a certain level of profitability. Given that the apartment is located in the city center and is brand new, I would say the lowest price I could offer would be around 800 Euro per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a fair price, but as a student, I'm on a tight budget. Can we negotiate a bit lower? Perhaps around 750 Euros?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, Max. As a landlord, I'm willing to work with you to find a price that suits both our needs. How about this: if you can sign a one-year lease and pay the rent on time every month, I could consider a slight discount. Let's say 775 Euro per month. Would that be more acceptable?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A one-year lease and paying on time is no problem for me. I'm a very dependable and responsible person. 775 Euro per month sounds like a good deal. I agree to the price of 775 Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment is yours at 775 Euro per month. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease, and we'll proceed with the paperwork. Thank you for choosing my apartment, Max. It's been a pleasure doing business with you. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
